description: A security vulnerability has been detected in Tipray 厦门天锐科技股份有限公司 Data Leakage Prevention System 天锐数据泄露防护系统 1.0. The impacted element is the function findTenantPage of the file findTenantPage.do. The manipulation of the argument sort leads to sql injection. The attack can be initiated remotely. The exploit has been disclosed publicly and may be used. The vendor was contacted early about this disclosure but did not respond in any way.

product.name: Data Leakage Prevention System 天锐数据泄露防护系统

vendor.name: Tipray 厦门天锐科技股份有限公司
